definitions.title: interj.
definitions.body: (onomatop.; cf. 0wuy, woy) woe! an impassioned expression of grief and despair: usually with dative [[אוֹי לִי]] Is 6:5 woe to me! for I am undone, so Is 24:16, Je 10:19, Je 15:10; [[אוֹי לָנוּ]] woe to us! 1Sa 4:7, 1Sa 4:8, Je 4:13, Je 6:4; [[אוֹי־נׇא לִי]] Je 4:31, Je 45:3; [[אוֹי־נׇא לָנוּ]] La 5:16. With the 2nd or 3rd ps. often implying a denunciation; [[אוֹי־לְךָ]] [[מוֹאָב]] Nu 21:29 (= Je 48:46) Je 13:27, Ez Eze 16:23 repeated [[אוֹי אוֹי לָח]]; Is 3:9 [[אוֹי לְנַפְשָׁם]] v:Is 3:11, Ho 7:13, Ho 9:12 (‖[[שׁׂד לָהֶם]]). With a voc. (or implicit accus.) Ez Eze 24:6, Eze 24:9 [[אוֹי עִיר הַדָּמִים]]; absol. Nu 24:23. Used as a subst. Pr 23:29 [[לְמִי אוֹי]] (‖[[לְמִי אֲבוֹי]]).
